ruleset.name: cdkinterfaces
ruleset.description: This ruleset checks for programming against implementations instead of interfaces.

rule.name: MoleculeFieldType
rule.message: Use the IMolecule interfaces instead of the Molecule implementation
rule.description: Programming against the CDK interfaces allows users to pick their favorite implementation (nonotify, datadebug).

rule.name: AtomFieldType
rule.message: Use the IAtom interfaces instead of the Atom implementation
rule.description: Programming against the CDK interfaces allows users to pick their favorite implementation (nonotify, datadebug).

rule.name: BondFieldType
rule.message: Use the IBond interfaces instead of the Bond implementation
rule.description: Programming against the CDK interfaces allows users to pick their favorite implementation (nonotify, datadebug).
